Data.Title: michael.haddon.me
Data.Description:
I have wanted to create a website for myself for a while. However, i have never previously had the time.

My goal with this website was to show off my previous work and to make it into a learning exercise.

This website is created with the canvas element, and the rendered elements are not HTML.
I thought this would be an interesting challenge.

Data.Title: Alien Escape
Data.Description:
Alien Escape is a small game I made within 36 hours for Digital Jersey's Hackathon.

I wanted to create something fun and retroy.
It was made mainly in Javascript, using the canvas element to draw and render the various elements.

The code is available below to look at on Github. You can also download & play the game yourself!
The code may be a little messy as it was a rush.

Data.Title: Little Spark
Data.Description:
Little Spark was to be a gift to someone very dear to me. Unfortunately i was unable to finish the project in time.

It was meant to be a sidescrolling platformer game, which was intended to tell a specific story.
I however was only able to get part of the level designer working.
I learnt a lot about the javascript canvas, and i would go on to use this knowledge for Alien Escape.

Data.Title: NestedBird.com
Data.Description:
NestedBird has been an ongoing project of mine for a very long time.
I have always had a passion for programming and music, and NestedBird was the fusion of both of these passions.

NestedBird is a service for local communities to support their local bands.
It is written in PHP, HTML, JS and SCSS and uses technologies like Amazon AWS, MySQL and Nginx.

Data.Title: SelectAllDeleteSaveAs.com
Data.Description:
I developed the website for the local band "Select All Delete Save As".

If i could go back to this project i would have many design decisions i would definitely make.
Most of my understanding of website design came after this project.

However the actual experience of working on this website was amazing.

Data.Title: GuildFreaks.com
Data.Description:
GuildFreaks was a fun little side project of mine for about a year.

The website was based on the MMORPG "GuildWars" which at the time was my favourite game

I had hoped to create a little community of people who also liked the game as i did, however i never managed to garner any interest.

The website is not available online anymore.

Data.Title: CoreConceptLearning.com
Data.Description:
This was the first website i made for someone commercially

It was written in PHP, HTML, CSS, JS & MySQL.

The website has since been redone by someone else in Flash.

Data.Title: Noob2Pro (unregistered website)
Data.Description:
Noob2Pro was one of (but not the) first websites i ever made. I was making it with a friend from USA, who was mostly responsible for getting me into web development.

The goal of the website was to create a service where people could help eachother get better at their favourite video games.
Share tips, create guides and have fun!
However, it never left early development.
